com.topcoder.search.builder.ldap
Class LDAPSearchStringBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.ldap.LDAPSearchStringBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchStringBuilder
public class LDAPSearchStringBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchStringBuilder

This class is an concrete impelementor of SearchStringBuilder interface. It builds LDAP filter string accordng to RFC 2254. For the version 1.2, build a LDAP searchable from LikeFilter is added. Defail refer to the method buildFromLikeFilter.

Version:
1.2
Author:
dmks, telly12

buildFromLikeFilter

protected java.lang.String buildFromLikeFilter(LikeFilter filter)

Build a LDAP searchable String from the LikeFilter, the wildcards in the value will be replaced by the stationary pattern in LDAP. Four types of LikeFilter are supported(refer the class doc of LikeFilter for detail).

This method is added in version 1.2.

Parameters:
filter - the LikeFilter object used to build the string
Returns:
a searchable String on ldap according the LikeFilter given
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the LikeFilter is Null

buildRecursively

protected java.lang.String buildRecursively(Filter filter)

build the string recursively.

This method is updated in version 1.2.

Parameters:
filter - The Filter object used to build the string
Returns:
constructed search string
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is Null
